title: ENVE builds the complete carbon package with new Custom Road bikes built to order
content:
It’s finally happened. ENVE’s most requested product since 2018 has come to life. No, it’s not a new wheelset, or handlebar. Instead, it’s a complete bike. Well, it could also be a chassis-only, or rolling chassis as well (more on that below). Founded in 2007, ENVE has been steadily expanding and improving their U.S. based […]

The post ENVE builds the complete carbon package with new Custom Road bikes built to order appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
